sentences.english: Peformances are many times on everyday.
sentences.chinese: 唱圣歌的表演每天都有很多次。

sentences.english: And the roses and the hymn-book told the real truth.
sentences.chinese: 玫瑰花与圣歌都说出了真正的事实。

sentences.english: The hymnal that mother gave me is containing more than 600 hymns.
sentences.chinese: 妈妈给我的那本赞美诗集里面有600多首圣歌。

sentences.english: There is a suggestion to make kids chant it at schools.
sentences.chinese: 现在正有关于让孩子在学校唱圣歌的提议。

sentences.english: It was absolutely still, and from a distance I could hear the hymn being sung at the professor`s grave.
sentences.chinese: 这里很静，从远处我能听到教授坟墓那边咏唱的圣歌。

sentences.english: Other-worldly chanting, to the rhythm of the rising and falling picks resonated through the hot, still air.
sentences.chinese: 闷热的空气里回荡着圣歌的旋律和镐斧起落的声音。

sentences.english: Working up a rhythm on his drum, he softly sings a Muslim hymn.
sentences.chinese: 有节奏地敲着鼓，他轻轻唱起穆斯林圣歌。

sentences.english: As a result, Gregorian chant fell into complete decadence by the end of the Middle Ages.
sentences.chinese: 结果格立高圣歌在中世纪末完全衰落。

sentences.english: One of the Gospels says they sang a hymn and they went out.
sentences.chinese: 福音书之一讲述他们唱着圣歌离开的场景。

sentences.english: The National Library and National Museum are responsible for a complete archive of the hudhud.
sentences.chinese: 国家图书馆和国家博物馆在为圣歌建立全套的档案。

sentences.english: From sullen earth sings hymns at heaven's gate;
sentences.chinese: 远离这阴沉的世界，唱着圣歌，飞向那天堂的乐土。

sentences.english: One of the hymns the couple chose for the service was the final one sung at Diana's funeral.
sentences.chinese: 婚礼上的一首圣歌曾是戴妃葬礼的结尾曲。

sentences.english: One line of musical development led to the creation of religious songs, which were called spirituals .
sentences.chinese: 一种发展路子逐渐产生了称作圣歌的宗教歌曲。

sentences.english: The hymn flooded his soul like a fresh breath of home.
sentences.chinese: 这首圣歌的旋律如同家乡的春风吹入他的心灵。

sentences.english: Plain chant was the music of the religious orders and was suited perfectly to the cathedral.
sentences.chinese: 单声圣歌是宗教音乐，非常适合在这种大教堂里演唱。

sentences.english: The old lazars who believe in Christ are singing saint songs before having lunch.
sentences.chinese: 信仰基督教的麻风病人在饭前唱圣歌。

definition: feudal term of praise for ruler, king or emperor/general term for saint in former times/term for God during the Taiping Heavenly Kingdom 太平天國|太平天国/Holy Spirit (in Christian Trinity)
